default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I can see... the pain and madness consuming you...

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: The stronger a Sinner... the closer they are to destruction...

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: The abyss is no longer my prison.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I hear the call of the abyss...

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: They will suffer no longer... That is good.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: No, they're not yet at peace...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Death is your only destination!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: I... don't want to... die...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: That was close. I was almost devoured by those voices again. Luckily... you came.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: The blood that stained this sword... I will never forget it.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: The Grim Reaperâ€”Sinners call me that. I... like that name.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: This body once had a soul. Her memories and her name have been devoured by the abyss. I'm not her... I'm just the remains of her.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Having a body like this... has its merits too. If I hadn't been infected, I wouldn't even have been able to walk normally.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I still remember the sun rising in the east, sunlight shining in through the window, onto me. That was the moment I looked forward to the most. When... did this memory happen?

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: For me, as long as you're here, death... is no longer the only answer.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: You make me aware of many... unfamiliar emotions. I look forward to your visit, I want to hear you talk, I want to see your smile. Is this a part of my forgotten past too? I want to... stay by your side.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Yes, I hear it... Are you in pain? Don't worry... Soon you'll be freed from it.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: That's useless. Since long ago, my body... hasn't been able to feel anything.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Why are you willing to stay with... a monster like me?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: I'm willing to roam the world for you.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Does this result satisfy your expectations?

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Another step closer...

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Don't do that, it's... dangerous for you.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: I'll relieve them of pain...

ashen_prayer.title: Obtain Attire
ashen_prayer.text: Sunshine, chapel, and red flowers... make one so nostalgic... Strange. What is nostalgic?

ashen_prayer.title: Greeting
ashen_prayer.text: Prayers have been answered... You are back.

ashen_prayer.title: Ordinary Contact 1
ashen_prayer.text: I know praying can't bring me peace, but I had no other choice. Thankfully, you are here now.

ashen_prayer.title: Ordinary Contact 2
ashen_prayer.text: When I walked in the DisSea, there wasn't a second I did not pray to see the light of day. This chase gave me the strength to persevere.

ashen_prayer.title: Ordinary Contact 3
ashen_prayer.text: I still remember that chapel near the DisSea where I could see sunlight. I loved it there... But I never found that place again after I left...

ashen_prayer.title: Ordinary Contact 4
ashen_prayer.text: Do you prefer this look? I can stay like this forever if that's what you want...

ashen_prayer.title: Idle
ashen_prayer.text: Please bring peace for them... for us...

ashen_prayer.title: Level Up
ashen_prayer.text: Thank you, even though I have never prayed for strength.

ashen_prayer.title: Pat Head
ashen_prayer.text: Thank you for making me feel warm.

ashen_prayer.title: Special Attention
ashen_prayer.text: Did you look for me... because of your unfulfilled wish? Don't worry. I'll pray for you.

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Obtain Attire
gloom_of_daybreak.text: I am NOX, the hunter of demons, the last of the Black Swords. Chosen one, tell me, do you too seek a final battle to seize that elusive dawn for humanity... If so, use me as your weapon!

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Greeting
gloom_of_daybreak.text: Let's set off. The sun has already risen. We're running out of time.

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Ordinary Contact 1
gloom_of_daybreak.text: Born to be a special combat weapon, the Black Swords are pariahs mixed with demon blood. No matter which side prevails, there will be no place for us in this world.

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Ordinary Contact 2
gloom_of_daybreak.text: Demons... are man-eating monsters that emerge from an unnamed darkness. Some of them may retain a human appearance, but don't be fooled. Demons have no emotions and are only driven by insatiable hunger. Once you face them, you have no other choice but to fight.

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Ordinary Contact 3
gloom_of_daybreak.text: Angel of Death... is that what they call me? What a shame. I'm no bloodless, tearless angel... With no wings, I can only crawl on the ground, yet I still yearn to look up at the sky.

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Ordinary Contact 4
gloom_of_daybreak.text: The sunrise by the lake, the peaceful village... Those are the only memories I've kept since I became a Black Sword. The arrival of the demons tore everything apart, including my past...

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Idle
gloom_of_daybreak.text: The demon blood will eventually devour my sanity. Such is the fate of every Black Sword... When that day comes, please grant me peace... I don't want to destroy everything I've protected.

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Special Attention
gloom_of_daybreak.text: Prayers don't bring miracles, nor can they elicit mercy out of demons... Only fighting can grant us the right to live... Chosen one, I will be the sharp blade in your hands and I shall bring the last hope to you and all who struggle to survive!

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Pat Head
gloom_of_daybreak.text: Rest assured, I will not leave your side.

gloom_of_daybreak.title: Level Up
gloom_of_daybreak.text: This is a necessary power... and a necessary sacrifice.
